zone.line: Inwrought with emblems of barbaric pr
pride?
Dissonant threats kill Silence far away.
The serene Heaven which wraps our Eden wide
With iron light is dyed!
legions
The Anarchs of the North pour forth thier millions
Like Chaos oer creation, uncreating.
An hundred tribes nourished on strange religions
And lawless slaveries. Down the aerial regions
Of the white Alps, desolating,
Famished wolves that bide no waiting,—
Blotting the glowing footsteps of old glory,
Trampling our columned cities into dust,
Thier dull & savage lust
On Beauty's corse to sickness satiating,
They come; the fields they tread look black &
hoary
With fire: from thier red feet the streams run
gory
Great Spirit! deepest Love
Whatich rulest & dost move
All things that live & are within the Italian shore!
Who spreadest Heaven around it,
Whose woods, rocks, waves, surround it;
Who sittest in thy star o'er Oceans western floor
